name: Avenger Hammer - Be the hero of City of Crime with Police Cars, Airplanes, Jetpack and Helicopters
name_original: Avenger Hammer - Be the hero of City of Crime with Police Cars, Airplanes, Jetpack and Helicopters
description:
When there is no justice, there can only be guns and tears!

Want to become a super avenger hero in the city occupied by gangsters & cartels?

Fight and kill enemies and spider masked rampaging gangs with power of Thor’s iron hammer bat for brave heart people of the city of crime show all gangs your iron punch!!!

Take down all gangsters, cartels,mafia clans agents with shotguns and bombs
__________________________________________
Get ready for intense action in this free, addictive, amazing game experience!
For all fans of free Superhero games, Runner games, Action games, Arcade games, Crime games, fight games and for those fans of guns weapon games, jetpack games, helicopter games, tank games, cars and truck games.
__________________________________________
Huge selection of weapons ( Pistols, AK-47, Machine guns, RPG 7 Anti-tank rocket-propelled Grenade launcher, Grenade, Shotgun )
Amazing Explosion Effects
Pistol have unlimited ammo
Amazing Game musics
Realistic weapon sounds
High resolution graphics
30 levels
Jetpack
5 different controllable vehicles:
Helicopters
- Apache Helicopter
- Attack Helicopter
Cars
- Van car
- Limousine car
- Army Truck
- Delivery Truck
- Gas Truck
- Sports Car
- School Bus
- Bus
- Police Car
- Taxi
Tanks
Aircrafts
Missle Launcher Turrets
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
